column4: How can I install linux on a laptop that won't boot from the CDrom? Can I make a special partion to load linux to?
Are there instructions on how to do that around?
Yes with a linux box and an XP box and another win98se box and I am running 98se on this box
I heard liveusb is simply not available for ubuntu, can you do debian instead? debian installation docs explain how to to install from usb
